person.name: Dwi Prabowo
person.profile: I have been working for more than 4 years as a Programmer, 2.5 years as a Web Developer and as my current favorite. Mainly technologies that I use are HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP (CI, Laravel), Git. I also had the experiences developing application for mobile devices, creating and building a startup team, and developing some desktop softwares.

job.title: Web Developer
job.desc: As a Web Developer, I have the responsibilities to develop some web based applications, maintain the frontend + backend, do some researches and implement those to the projects.

job.title: Massport Java Programmer
job.desc:
I started as a Junior Java Programmer,

  • Massport Java Game
  • Using company's Framework and tools
  • Fixing Bugs
  • Releasing Builds.

As a Senior Programmer I had additional task and that is dealing with the junior.

As a Supervisor Programmer I had more task like,

  • Manage small team (3 people at the time)
  • Reporting
  • More Team meetings.
